sense.gloss: transmission of electricity, electricity supply, power supply

sdata.j: ↑一子相伝↑↓いっし|そうでん|↓の↑技↑↓わざ↓と↑言↑↓い↓うわりには、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑蹴↑↓け↓りは↑大↑↓たい↓した↑事↑↓こと↓はないね。
sdata.e: For a guy who was chosen by his father as the only son to be taught the secrets of this martial art, he doesn't have much of a kick.

sdata.j: トムはいちかばちかで、メアリーをデートに↑誘↑↓さ|そ↓う↑電話↑↓でん|わ↓をした。
sdata.e: Tom just took a chance and called Mary to ask her out.
